description: Frozen Treat-Lovers of Long Beach, it’s a nice day when you know that so much fun and flavor is just within reach, thanks to L&J; Kona Ice, with its mighty selection of flavors for the perfect icy treat, adored by kids and adults alike.With soft shaved ice, festive Calypso tunes, and the famous Flavorwave that allows you to concoct your own fruity creation, Kona Ice provides everything nice to your sunshiny SoCal summer.
name: L & J Kona Ice
